name: Cyber Griffin
description:
Cyber Griffin is based on assets from the FreeDoom project.  It is a game that is still under development, but is playable.  Created using the Godot Game engine is runs on all major platforms and is complete Free and Open Source under a GPLv3 license.

You can find out more and play it in your web browser here:
https://filmsbykris.com/games/2021/cyber-griffin/

Source Code for the project can be found here:
https://gitlab.com/metalx1000/cyber-griffin
